data.actual_result: microphone test stays on after changing input method or closing settings
data.expected_result: microphone testing should be turned off when exiting settings
data.short_description: microphone testing stays on after closing and reopening settings or changing input method
data.steps_to_repro: - open voice & video settings - click on `test my microphone` button - close settings and reopen it or change input method - notice how the microphone test is still on
